auth.resetMsg: Alternatif olarak, yeni bir parola belirlemek için kimlik bilgilerinizi ve depolanan verilerinizi temizleyin
auth.initMsg: API kimlik bilgilerinizi ve stratejilerinizi şifrelemek için bir parola oluşturun. Tüm veriler yerel olarak depolanır ve şifreniz hashlenir

closePositionModal.title: Closing Position
closePositionModal.body: Are you sure you want to close {{pair}} position?

launchStrategyModal.title: Launch Strategy
launchStrategyModal.body: This action will launch this strategy in LIVE mode, acting automatically on your behalf trough the Bitfinex API and using real funds from your Exchange wallet. The current active strategy will stop and this one will take its place.

accdist.title: Biriktir/Dağıt
accdist.help:
Biriktirme/Dağıtma, büyük bir emri, piyasadaki diğer oyuncuların farketmesini en aza indirmek için düzenli veya düzensiz aralıklarla gönderilen daha küçük rastgele parçalara ayırmanıza olanak tanır.

Algoritma, 'Doldurmayı Bekle' seçeneğini etkinleştirerek, sonraki emirleri göndermeden önce her bir bileşenin dolmasını sağlayacaktır.

'Yakala' özelliğinin etkinleştirilmesi, önceki siparişlerin doldurulması beklenenden daha uzun sürdüyse algoritmanın bir sonraki sipariş için dilim aralığını yok saymasına neden olur ve böylece tüm sipariş için doldurma süresinin olumsuz etkilenmesini önler. Ayrıca, 'yakalarken', dilim aralığı 0,2 saniyeye sabit kodlanmıştır.

Not: Kalan emir miktarı minimum emir miktarından az ise dikkate alınmayacaktır.
accdist.amountDistortionHelp: Tespiti önlemek için bireysel emir boyutlarını çarpıtacak miktar, yüzde olarak
accdist.sliceIntervalSecHelp: Her dilim sırası arasında saniye cinsinden bekleme süresi

iceberg.title: Iceberg
iceberg.help:
Iceberg, piyasaya büyük bir sipariş vermenizi sağlarken aynı anda yalnızca küçük bir kısmının doldurulmasını sağlar.

'Gizli Olarak Fazla' seçeneğini etkinleştirerek, kalanı gizli bir emir olarak sunmak ve büyük işlemler gerçekleştirirken minimum piyasa kesintisine izin vermek mümkündür.

algoOrderForm.visibleOnHitHelp: The rest part of the hidden order will be visible after first hit (partial execution).
algoOrderForm.intervalDistortionHelp: Yüzde olarak her dilim aralığını çarpıtacak miktar
algoOrderForm.offsetTypeHelp: Bir gösterge/defter/son işlemden mahsup edilen bağıl sipariş fiyatı
algoOrderForm.offsetDeltaHelp: Price as distance from offset value
algoOrderForm.smaPeriodHelp: Period for simple moving average indicator
algoOrderForm.emaPeriodHelp: Period for exponential moving average indicator
algoOrderForm.priceCapTypeHelp: Upper price limit for relative order type
algoOrderForm.capDeltaHelp: Price as distance from cap value
algoOrderForm.excessAsHiddenHelp: Create a hidden order for the non-slice amount
algoOrderForm.amountHelp: Total order amount, to be executed slice-by-slice
algoOrderForm.sliceAmountHelp: Allows individual buy & sell amounts to be adjusted
algoOrderForm.sliceAmountPercHelp: Takes percentage of total order amount for individual buy & sell amounts

crossover.title: MA Crossover
crossover.help:
Schedules either a LIMIT or MARKET order to execute when two moving averages cross. 

Both moving averages can be either exponential or smoothed, and can have differing time frames and candle keys (close, open, etc)

ococo.title: Order Creates OcO
ococo.help: Creates a standard LIMIT or MARKET order, and schedules an OcO order to be submitted after the initial order fills. All of the normal LIMIT/MARKET parameters are available on both orders.

algoOrderForm.hiddenHelp: Bu seçenek deftere diğer yatırımcılara görüntülenmeyen bir emir girmenizi sağlar. Fiyat/zaman önceliği görüntülenen emir ile aynıdır ancak gizli emir için her zaman "alıcı" ücreti ödenirken bir gizli emre karşı al-sat yapanlar her zaman yapıcı ücreti ödeyecektir
algoOrderForm.postOnlyHelp: 'Post Only' limit orders are orders that allow you to be sure to always pay the maker fee. When placed, a 'Post Only' limit order is either inserted into the orderbook or cancelled and not matched with a pre-existing order
algoOrderForm.catchUpHelp: If the algo falls behind in filling orders, disregard the slice interval and submit the next order after a 2 second delay
algoOrderForm.awaitFillHelp: Keeps the current order open until it fills, while tracking progress for 'Catch up'

pingpong.title: Ping/Pong
pingpong.help:
Ping/pong submits multiple 'ping' orders; once a ping order fills, an associated 'pong' order is submitted.

Multiple ping/pong pairs can be created by specifying an order count greater than 1, a suitable min/max ping price, and a pong distance. Multiple ping orders will be created between the specified min/max prices, with the associated pongs offset by the pong distance from the ping price
pingpong.endlessHelp: If true, pings will be recreated once their associated pongs fill

twap.title: TWAP
twap.help:
TWAP spreads an order out through time in order to fill at the time-weighted average price, calculated between the time the order is submitted to the final atomic order close.

The price target may be set either by the order book, last trade price, or a custom explicit target that must be conditionally matched against another factor.

With custom price targets, the price condition may be specified to match against either the order book or last trade. If a price delta is specified, the target must be within the delta in order to match. 

Note: If amount distortion is provided, the total order amounts will not exceed the total amount but may be slightly less than the total amount specified.
twap.targetDeltaHelp: ± Distance from price target for match

algoOrderForm.amountDistortionPercHelp: Amount to distort individual order sizes to prevent detection, in percent
algoOrderForm.sliceIntervalSecHelp: Duration over which to trade slice
algoOrderForm.priceConditionHelp: Match point for custom price targets

AOPauseModal.title: Algo Emirleri Duraklat
AOPauseModal.text1: Closing the application while algo orders are active will require you to resume/cancel the algo orders when you relaunch the Bitfinex Honey application.
AOPauseModal.text2: When you restart the Bitfinex Honey application, you will be prompted to select between the currently active algo orders to which two of the given options can be applied:
AOPauseModal.text3: 1. Resume: The atomic orders placed by the selected algo orders (if active) will be cancelled, and the algo orders will resume placing orders for the remaining amounts. The unselected algo orders will not be resumed and will be lost in perpetuity.
AOPauseModal.text4: 2. Cancel All: All atomic orders placed by the algo orders (if active) will be cancelled and no algo orders will be resumed.
AOPauseModal.text5: Note: Atomic orders will remain active if DMS option is disabled.

appSettings.description: Official free algorithmic trading app based on the <url>Bitfinex API</url>, created by the Bitfinex team.
appSettings.licence: This software is licenced under the <url>Apache-2.0</url> Licence.
appSettings.sourceCode: The source code is available on <url>Github</url>.

appSettings.noBfxAccountPaper: Don't have a Paper Trading account?
appSettings.apiConnecting: Please wait while connecting to the API server...
appSettings.deadManText1: Enabling the Dead Man switch will automatically cancel all active orders when the application closes.
appSettings.deadManText2: Algorithmic orders are cancelled on application close; without the Dead Man switch, any atomic orders created by an AO will remain open, and state may be lost when the application is started up again.
appSettings.deadManWarning: Disabling this should be done with caution!
appSettings.showPauseInfoText: If checked, the modal with explanations will be displayed when you close the app with active Algo Orders.
appSettings.rebootText: When you experience a poor internet connection, the modal window that notifies you of this will not be displayed and the app will restart automatically.
appSettings.howToCreateDesc: This is required to operate in the Live Environment

Users of 'beta release' mode use this mode at their own risk. In no event shall Bitfinex be liable for any damages whatsover (including, without limitation, damages for loss of profit, business interruption, loss of information or otherwise) arising out of the use of, or inability to use, 'beta release' mode, even if Bitfinex has been advised of the possibility of such damages.
appSettings.betaProgramText: Stay up-to-date with every new feature and be one of the first to try it as soon as it’s released.

confirmDMSModal.title: Enable Dead Man Switch
confirmDMSModal.text:
Please be aware that when this setting is enabled, closing the app will not only cancel all orders that have been created by the Bitfinex Honey, but will also cancel all other orders, including those that have been opened on the Bitfinex website or elsewhere.

This is a recommended setting, but you should be aware of the possible consequences.

oldFormatModal.title: Layout upgrade
oldFormatModal.text1: Since the v3.12.0 update we have reworked the way of how the application layout works.
oldFormatModal.text2: From now on, each component, including the Order form and Ticker symbols, is independent and can be added or removed in the layout settings.
oldFormatModal.text3: If needed, you can add these components to your custom layout in the layout settings, sorry for the inconvenience.

orderForm.title: Execute Order
orderForm.visibleOnHitHelp: The rest part of the hidden order will be visible after first hit (partial execution).
orderForm.fokHelp: An FOK order is a limit order that must fully fill immediately or it is canceled (killed).
orderForm.iocHelp: An IOC order is a limit order that must fill immediately, with any unfilled portion cancelled.
orderForm.limitHelp:
A Limit order submits a buy or sell order at the specified price. If the price is above or below the current best ask/bid (respectively for buy/sell orders) it will execute immediately as a TAKER order. Otherwise, it will be inserted into the order book and execute as a MAKER order when the market reaches the order's price.

If the 'hidden' option is enabled, the order will be inserted in the order book but will not be visible to other users, and will execute as a TAKER.

The OCO (one-cancels-the-other) option may be used to submit a pair of orders; once one of the orders fills, the other is automatically cancelled.

The 'post-only' option ensures the order is inserted into the order book instead of being immediately filled, and cancels it otherwise.

A Time-In-Force date may be specified, after which the order will be automatically cancelled.
orderForm.marketHelp:
A Market order will fill immediately at the current market price.

If the 'reduce-only' option is specified, the order will be cancelled if it would open or increase the size of an open position.
orderForm.stopLimitHelp:
The Stop-Limit order type differs from the basic Stop order by allowing the specification of an exact price of execution.

Once the 'stop' price is reached, a 'Limit' order is created at the specified limit price.

If the 'hidden' option is enabled, the order will be inserted in the order book but will not be visible to other users, and will execute as a TAKER.

If the 'reduce-only' option is specified, the resulting Limit order will be cancelled if it would open or increase the size of an open position.

A Time-In-Force date may be specified, after which the order will be automatically cancelled.
orderForm.stopHelp:
Stop orders are automatically converted to Market orders once the specified stop price is reached.

For control over the execution price, use a Stop-Limit order.

If the 'reduce-only' option is specified, the order will be cancelled if it would open or increase the size of an open position.

A Time-In-Force date may be specified, after which the order will be automatically cancelled.
orderForm.trailingStopHelp:
Trailing stop orders follow ('trail') the market price up (for sell orders) or down (for buy orders) by the specified trailing distance. If the market price moves against the trailing stop order, it does not move and will execute once the market reaches the order.

If the 'reduce-only' option is specified, the order will be cancelled if it would open or increase the size of an open position.

A Time-In-Force date may be specified, after which the order will be automatically cancelled.
orderForm.reduceOnlyMessage: Cancels the order if it would increase the size of an open position
orderForm.hiddenMessage: This option allows you to place an order into the book but not have it displayed to other traders. Price/time priority is the same as a displayed order, but the hidden order will always pay the "taker" fee while those trading against a hidden order will pay the "maker" fee
orderForm.ocoMessage: This option allows you to place a pair of orders stipulating that if one order is executed fully or partially, then the other order is automatically canceled. A one-cancels-the-other order combines a stop order with a limit order. This option allows you to place both take profit and stop loss targets for your position (only for limit orders)
orderForm.tifMessage: Geçerlilik Süresi: Otomatik emir iptali için tarih ve saat belirleyin
orderForm.postOnlyMessage: "Post Only" limit orders are orders that allow you to be sure to always pay the maker fee. When placed, a "Post Only" limit order is either inserted into the order book or cancelled (only for limit orders)

statusbar.liveModeDisclaimer: You are in LIVE mode. All orders placed in this mode are executed in the real market using real funds

strategyEditor.unsavedChangesModalTitle: Do you need to save changes in the strategy before closing?
strategyEditor.cancelAppProcessDescription:
If you feel this process is taking too long you can cancel it by clicking in the next button.

Take into consideration that this might have unintended consequences in case you are operating in the LIVE environment.
strategyEditor.unsavedChangesModalText: You have unsaved changes in "{{strategyName}}". If you don`t save them, they will be permanently deleted
strategyEditor.capitalAllocationHelp:
This is the maximum amount of capital you want to deploy to this strategy, in quote currency (or equivalent)
NOTE: you must have enough funds in the corresponding wallet to launch the strategy
strategyEditor.stopLossHelp:
This is the maximum amount of capital you are willing to lose, as a percentage of the capital allocation
IMPORTANT: the strategy will automatically stop if this level is reached
strategyEditor.maximumDrawdownHelp:
This is the maximum drawdown allowed for this strategy in percentage
IMPORTANT: the strategy will automatically stop if this level is reached
strategyEditor.useSandboxTooltip: Click the toggle to move to the SANDBOX environment where you can create, edit and backtest strategies and much more
strategyEditor.orSelectOne: or select one from the list below
strategyEditor.selectStrategy: Please select a strategy from the list below or head to the SANDBOX mode to begin drafting a new one
strategyEditor.newStrategyModalLongError: Strategy name is too long ({{labelSize}}/{{MAX_LABEL_LENGTH}} characters)
strategyEditor.backtestingCreateMessage: Create a strategy to begin backtesting
strategyEditor.useTradesCheckboxDescription: Match against real trade history. Much slower, More Accurate
strategyEditor.checkboxWarningMessage: At least one checkbox should be selected
strategyEditor.invalidPeriod: End date has to be after the start date
